books.title: The President Is Missing
books.description: The publishing event of 2018: Bill Clinton and James Patterson’s The President Is Missing is a superlative thriller…one that can really happen, and one that must not be missed
books.author: Bill Clinton and James Patterson

books.title: Ordinary People
books.description: From the author of 26a comes Ordinary People, a remarkable novel about two couples who are drifting apart.
books.author: Diana Evans

books.title: The Shepherd’s Hut
books.description: Tim Winton’s brilliant novel The Riders was about a journey with a potentially perilous ending, and his new novel, The Shepherd’s Hut, revisits some of these themes
books.author: Tim Winton

books.title: The Mermaid and Mrs Hancock
books.description: Described by The Bookseller as the next The Essex Serpent, this astounding debut delivers a wonderful romp through Georgian London, charting one merchant’s unlikely rise through society when he is gifted an unusual creature from the sea and decides to display it to the public.
books.author: Imogen Hermes Gowar
